data.title: Recursos en Español
data.text:
https://ezproxy.nmls.lib.tx.us/login?url=http://www.atozdatabases.com/search?langAtoZ Databases

Buscar negocios, personas, listas de correo, las oportunidades de ventas, empleos, y más.

AtoZdatabases es la referencia de primer nivel, investigación, Marketing, ventas de correo listas / ventas, y la búsqueda de empleo de base de datos. La base de datos incluye 30 millones de perfiles de negocios y ejecutivos, 220 millones de habitants con informacion de la intereses, aficiones y estilos de vida, 7 millones de listados de trabajo en tiempo real, 2 millones de nuevas empresas, 12 millones de profesionales de la salud, nuevo moverse y las nuevas bases de datos de propietarios, y mucho más. Ideal para las oportunidades de ventas, listas de correo, estudios de mercado, oportunidades de empleo, la búsqueda de amigos, parientes y un montón de otras posibilidades.

Frecuencia de actualización: Algunas bases de datos se actualizan mensualmente, semanalmente algunos, y la base de datos puestos de trabajo es una actualización en tiempo real.

Salida: Correo electrónico,imprimir o descargar los registros de 1000 por la búsqueda sin límite global.

ebrary e-Libro ebooks

ProQuest ebrary ofrece libros electrónicos autorizados en una amplia gama de áreas temáticas, junto con potentes herramientas para ayudarle a encontrar, utilizar y gestionar la información que necesita.

Los libros electrónicos de ciencia y tecnología ofrecen libros electrónicos cuidadosamente seleccionados que abarcan todos los temas de ciencia y tecnología con una solidez excepcional en computadoras y TI, ingeniería, ciencias biológicas y físicas, y matemáticas. Está diseñado para facilitar el flujo de trabajo de la investigación y los resultados para su biblioteca y sus usuarios. La suscripción incluía editoriales de renombre como Wiley, Island Press, World Scientific Press, University of North Carolina Press, Elsevier Science, Rutgers University Press y Temple University Press.

e-Libro Premium incluye más de 100.000 títulos de más de 500 editoriales, el 95% de Latinoamérica y España. e-Libro Premium también incluye títulos de acceso abierto para un acceso fluido a trabajos académicos. Los libros para la colección se seleccionan por su valor tanto de investigación como de instrucción de las principales editoriales comerciales, académicas y universitarias de España y de todos los países de América Latina. La colección cubre toda la gama de temas académicos, así como obras de referencia más generales.

HelpNow - Online Tutors for Instant Help with Your Homework

Real live tutors are available 7 days a week from 3 p.m. to 10 p.m.

Test prep and study resources are available anytime 24/7.

No wait times for connecting to a real tutor!

No cutoff time: the tutor stays with you until you understand!

Ayuda para la Tarea por Computador

Homework Help: if you have a problem to solve

SkillSurfer: learning library with thousands of lessons, quizzes and tests. A "Get Live Help" button above a lesson or quiz connects you to a live online tutor.

Writing Lab: get live writing assistance or, better yet, submit your work for a full critique within 24 hours.

24/7 Help: submit your questions anytime and the tutor will reply within 24 hours

Study & Collaborate: Use Brainwave™ to record comments and explanations to archive and share; use Flashbulb™ to create flashcards or select from a vast library to study with; use Meet™ to set up live tutoring sessions in the Brainfuse online classroom with friends, colleagues, teachers, etc. Study, collaborate and record your sessions for future playback.

Language Lab: tutoring for your foreign language homework

Learning Account: create an account to view past sessions, access your Message Center, Tests, Calendar, and Brainwaves.

Full Spanish-speaking services | Servicios completos en español

For more information visit the HelpNow FAQ page

Brainfuse Video Tutorial

Informe Académico (Gale OneFile)

Contiene recursos de referencia general de calidad para usuarios de habla hispana.

LearningExpress Library

LearningExpress Library features nearly 1,000 online tutorials, practice tests,and eBooks to help patrons of all ages. It offers job search and workplace skills improvement, skill building in reading, writing, math, and basic science, career certification and licensure exam prep, college and grad school entrance test prep, GED® test prep, and more.

LearningExpress consists of:

Recursos para Hispanohablantes - Este centro ofrece a los adultos que están muy ocupados los recursos para mejorar sus habilidades básicas, ganar sus credenciales de GED® o ser ciudadano estadounidense.

School Center - The resources here can help students in elementary, middle, and high school prepare for important tests, get extra help with assignments, and boost their skills in important subjects.

High School Equivalency Center - Earning a high school equivalency credential can open the door to better income, a more fulfilling job, and a college education. If you are preparing for the GED® test, HiSET® or TASC™ exams, our practice tests, interactive tutorials, and eBooks will help you reach your goal.

Adult Learning Center - This center offers busy adults the resources to improve basic skills in reading, writing, math,and becoming a U.S. citizen.

College Center Plus - Strengthen your academic skills and prepare for placement tests and graduate school entrance exams.

College Prep Center - Getting into college is an important step to building a strong future. First, you must do well on your college admission tests and write a personal essay that highlights your special talents. Use this center to get the resources you need to achieve your college preparation goals.

Career Center Plus - Prepare for a career exam, explore occupations, and improve your workplace skills.

Job & Career Accelerator™ - Whether you’re looking to find a new job in your current field or pursue a career in an exciting new industry, Job & Career Accelerator™ has the powerful tools and expert guidance to help you through every step of the process.

Computer Skills - Video courses are the fastest and easiest way to learn how to use a computer. Use the materials in this center to learn the basics of computers, from searching the Internet to using popular programs for word processing, creating spreadsheets and databases, implementing design, and more.

Learning Express Tutorial

Mango Languages

PhD-created and linguist-approved software teaches real conversations in over 70 languages and makes it fun. You will build language proficiency and cultural understanding around real-world communication skills that you'll actually need. Learn through examples like 'What time are they arriving?' instead of much less useful phrases like 'The dog is under the table.' With Mango, you'll learn vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar, and culture all in one integrated experience.

Intuitive - Mango breaks things down into small, bite-sized chunks; then challenges you to build them back up into full sentences. You'll learn language structure and vocabulary in a highly intuitive and contextual way.

Construct - Mango teaches you how to create new meaning on your own by challenging you to combine freshly learned language structures and vocabulary with ones you learned in the past. You'll be amazed at how early you develop flexible communication skills.

Pronounce - Mango's interactive words, pronunciation helpers, and voice comparison technology gives you everything you need to dial in that perfect accent. Audio can be heard slow and articulate, or at a faster conversational pace.

Culture - Mango gives you the crucial cultural insights you'll need to communicate appropriately, meet new friends, and fully understand your new language.

Movies - Like to watch movies? Imagine having everything you need to learn a new language through foreign film. With Mango, you get real entertainment immersion to take your skills to the next level.

Memory building exercises - Perfectly-timed memory building exercises ensure you actually retain what you've learned. Get something wrong? Don't worry, you'll come back to it later.

Semantic color mapping - Color mapping quickly reveals the relationship between your native language and your target language, giving you insight into the grammar and expressive mechanics of your new language.

Understood and literal meanings - Get a better understanding of your new language by learning both understood and literal meanings. For example, the literal meaning of “How are you?“ is “How your things?“ in Russian.

English as a Second Language - Native speakers of over 18 popular languages can learn English from Spanish, Arabic, Chinese, Vietnamese and Korean plus many more.

Specialty Courses - Celebrate world cultures and learn languages in specific contexts. Want to enjoy wine and cheese in France in French? Speak Italian at the horse races in Sienna? Converse in German at Oktoberfest and have the proper attire? There are practical courses too like medical and legal Spanish. Really get ready for Talk Like a Pirate Day next year!

Mobile - Mango goes wherever you go with full apps for iOS and Android mobile devices. Over 60 language courses available in the palm of your hand.

Online - Mango can be used online from any computer, anywhere, at any time. No CDs, DVDs, downloads, or installations. Used in conjunction with our mobile apps, Mango is one of the most accessible language and culture learning platforms on earth.

Mango Languages Tutorial

VetNow

VetNow supports your community’s veterans and their families with navigating the VA bureaucracy, providing academic tutoring, and employment transition assistance.

Live Veteran Navigator: Connect with an expert to learn more about eligible VA benefits and community resources.

Live Job Coaching: Get help to transition your resume from military to civilian careers including translating military skills, key words, and more.

Resume Lab: Get help to transition your resume from military to civilian careers including formatting, key words, transferable skills, and more from Brainfuse experts.

Live service hours:

Tutors/Job Coaches – 7 days a week: 2 to 11 p.m.

VA Navigators – Monday thru Friday: 1 to 9 p.m.

Additional resources available 24/7:
